content: As per the National Guard Bureau, there are approximately 445,000 Army National Guard soldiers and 331,000 Air National Guard airmen (for a combined total of around 776,000) serving in the United States currently. The National Guard has units in all 50 states, 3 territories, and the District of Columbia. National Guard personnel come from diverse backgrounds and professions, and many serve part-time, while others serve full-time in support of their state or the nation.
